<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Client Routes Example
</h1>
[![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/a1eeaaf5-afad-4c11-88b3-2f5ea85b6c9d/deploy-status)](https://app.netlify.com/sites/blissful-hugle-d3a663/deploys)


# What This Is

This is a bare-bones example of how to use client-only routes to generate pages on-the-fly with Gatsby using the `createPages` Gatsby Node API (see `gatsby-node.js`).

# Deploys

This site has been deployed with both Zeit Now and Netlify. Check out the deploys here:  

- <a href="https://gatsby-client-routes-example-git-master.turnttech.now.sh/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Zeit Now</a>
- <a href="https://gatsby-client-routes-example-git-master.turnttech.now.sh/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Netlify</a>
